website_summaries.verdict: This glamorous Cinderella doll will be adored by kids who love Disney princesses.
pros: Doll is a fun toy on its own or when paired with a Disney dollhouse
Good quality doll that is decently sized – slightly larger than a Barbie
Doll has pretty features and is recognizable as Cinderella

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Rapunzel
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old granddaughter - she LOVES Rapunzel and could not take her eyes off of this doll when she opened her birthday presents. I like the Hasbro dolls. They are more childish looking. Nice size and quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Six year old approved
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Cinderella-obsessed six year old daughter. It's the same kind you can buy at Wal-Mart, but I was able to get it here with a few clicks instead of navigating Wally World. She received Aurora at the same time and now they both sleep in her bed. It is not the same size as a Barbie, so Barbie clothes will not fit. I have seen some clothes made specifically for these Disney Princess dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget

customer_reviews.title: Decent Doll
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (5) loves these dolls. They're barbie sized and stand up to a decent amount of abuse. I'm not a fan of barbie products, so these are a great substitute. Even their hair can be combed back to normal (with a little dangler). I catch my 9 year old playing with them at times. For the money, it's a great toy/present. Paid under $10 each for several of them. This one is not as fancy as the rest (but that is her standard outfit) and her face is a bit odd to me... not as innocent looking as the other similar dolls. lol.
customer_reviews.author: DeWcandles

customer_reviews.title: Love these dolls
customer_reviews.text: I love these dolls and couldn't beat the price on black Friday. My girls age 6 and 3 love them. I expected them to be cheap plastic but they weren't I was impressed with the quality. They are very durable. My only recommendation would be to keep the rubber band that holds the shoes on on for as long as you can because we have spent a significant amount of time searching for shoes! I was so happy to find a Pocahontas doll since she is one of my favorites. We have all but 1 of these dolls now and love all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good Toy for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (5) loves these dolls. They're barbie sized and stand up to a decent amount of abuse. I'm not a fan of barbie products, so these are a great substitute. Even their hair can be combed back to normal (with a little dangler). I catch my 9 year old playing with them at times. For the money, it's a great toy/present. Paid under $10 each for several of them.
customer_reviews.author: DeWcandles

customer_reviews.title: at best.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really surprised by all the 5 star reviews. This doll doesn't retail for much and I can say, we get what we pay for. Flimsy packaging, shoes that do not stay on AT ALL, flimsy plastic and "meh" quality. Mediocre, at best.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: so these are a great substitute. Even their hair can be combed back ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (5) loves these dolls. They're barbie sized and stand up to a decent amount of abuse. I'm not a fan of barbie products, so these are a great substitute. Even their hair can be combed back to normal (with a little dangler). I catch my 9 year old playing with them at times. For the money, it's a great toy/present. Paid under $10 each for several of them.
customer_reviews.author: DeWcandles

customer_reviews.title: She loves playing with her right alongside her other Disney Princess dolls and was very happy to have this addition to her colle
customer_reviews.text: MY daughter is VERY into Disney princesses lately. This Mulan doll comes exactly as pictured. While her dress seems slightly different from the one I remember from the cartoon movie, my daughter doesn't seem to mind at all. She loves playing with her right alongside her other Disney Princess dolls and was very happy to have this addition to her collection.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and adorable
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. One thing to know is the hair on the Disney Shimmer Barbies are not meant to be brushed. My daughter tried and it took half a bottle of detangler and an hour of curling to get it back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: MizzMeganMae

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing doll, made of good quality plastic and does not feel cheap at all. I bought all the Disney princess dolls for my niece and she loves all of them. They are good products to play with and is safe for kids. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Vivek Yadav

customer_reviews.title: Hasbro did a great job
customer_reviews.text: Hasbro did a great job with these Disney dolls. I felt "wow" almost in the same way I felt when I first saw the Animator's dolls in persons. Of course, I was having the prices of the dolls in mind too. The paints on the doll faces are quite good. The head to body proportion is more like that of an young girl. I have bought the entire set.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Love the shimmer dolls!
customer_reviews.text: As a Disney lover I was so happy these dolls were on sale and available for Christmas. My nieces and daughter loved these dolls! I would say , I was a little disappointed in the quality of the clothing, however I could not pass up the price. I bought the Rapunzel Doll, Jasmine Doll and Pocahontas. The Pocahontas doll was the best one as she was just beautiful and the level of detail was very well done.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Terry aka Triplet Mom

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Jasmine doll!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who's favorite princess is jasmine. Needless to say she loved it! They are nicely made dolls with cute outfits and accessories. Will definitly be getting more of this line for her princess collection!
customer_reviews.author: kmaebyte

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 year old. We recently watched Pocahontas and she loves it. It used to be my favorite movie, so I wanted to find a toy to commemorate. She loves it. The hair is all over the place and impossible to make smooth again now, but it's still adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Mya

customer_reviews.title: Doll
customer_reviews.text: Good Disney toy, clothing is more appropriate on this version than on most of the Jasmine dolls.
customer_reviews.author: S l b

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Got her in the mail yesterday and I'll say it was well worth the wait :) The only feature missing is the tattoo or mark on her right arm, but other than that, she is absolutely beautiful :) Somehow, she reminds me a little of my old Sun Colors Pocahontas doll from 1995, another treasure :) And since I have the entire Royal Shimmer line (except for Ariel, as I already have an Ariel doll-and she fits right in with the others), I'll definitely say Hats Off to Hasbro. WONDERFUL job!!
customer_reviews.author: Breanne

customer_reviews.title: Cute inexpensive doll for preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: Cute doll for preschoolers. Only separate pieces are shoes- these can get easily lost. The arms and legs don't bend at the elbows and knees which would be nice but otherwise easy for kids to move and play with. Heads are strangely large.
customer_reviews.author: Charleen

customer_reviews.title: This Pocahontas is beautiful, well made
customer_reviews.text: My little girl has this doll along with several other dolls from this line of Shimmer Disney dolls. I bought two more of these dolls for my little cousins. My husband's side of the family is Native American and it's hard to find dolls that are as well. This Pocahontas is beautiful, well made, and as she is Native American it makes her that much more special to our girls.
customer_reviews.author: DaisySayWhat

customer_reviews.title: Missing Shoes?
customer_reviews.text: Doll is fine, and this may not be a big deal for most people, but it doesn't seem to come with the shoes. We got one and thought it was a fluke so returned it for another one that also didn't come with shoes. The box and picture definitely show shoes, and the feet are shaped like there should be shoes, but somehow the shoes didn't make it in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W.

customer_reviews.title: pretty princess
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a little girl who wasn't going to have much at Christmastime. We want one, too! She is very pretty! My husband & I got Pocahontas for our 5-year old daughter & she is equally as beautiful as Mulan! Now we want all of the Royal Shimmer princesses!
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: Simply beautiful. What a big surprise for my granddaughter on ...
customer_reviews.text: Simply beautiful. What a big surprise for my granddaughter on Christmas day. She doesn't have and Jasmine dolls so she'll be really excited. The doll seems well built and the clothes are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: a doll that LOOKS like Merida! The only negative is that her head ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a doll that LOOKS like Merida! The only negative is that her head is a bit more wobbly than I'd prefer. It spins backward pretty easily. I think I'm going to use a bit of hair gel to tighten it up a little.
customer_reviews.author: WaterRedwood

customer_reviews.title: Great Pocahontas toy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Pocahontas! This was a great doll to add to her collection.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent L.

customer_reviews.title: Great doll
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old daughter. She loves the Disney princesses and I love the price of this line! These dolls are mostly hard plastic. Her hair was very "tangled" within a day but my daughter still loves this rapunzel.
customer_reviews.author: lacee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Doll, though perhaps too beautiful for some
customer_reviews.text: Another beautiful Royal Shimmer doll. While it's a beautiful doll and I'm sure my granddaughter will love it, it doesn't quite look right to me, while not as bad as some of the others Rapunzel seems just a bit too "made up" for me personally.
customer_reviews.author: NMesarch

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described. Good quality and cheaper than in the stores. Does contain small pieces like the shoes that come off and won't really stay on once the packing is removed. My daughter loves them however. Has very soft long hair!
customer_reviews.author: Riddle me this

customer_reviews.title: Just as  described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described. Good quality and cheaper than in the stores. Does contain small pieces like the shoes that come off and won't really stay on once the packing is removed. My daughter loves them however. Has very soft long hair!
customer_reviews.author: Riddle me this

customer_reviews.title: Good size good product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for young girls... My granddaughter loved it very much
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: REALLY GOOD QUALITY.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting these to be really cheap and cheasy but they are really large and good quality. I thought I would be able to put two of them in a stocking but they are too big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too my delight, my 4-year-old niece is very into the princesses
customer_reviews.text: Too my delight, my 4-year-old niece is very into the princesses. I wanted to get her one that was new to her - so I bought her Merida & Mulan. She was most excited by the fact Merida has red hair like me - LOL.
customer_reviews.author: unlimitedHope

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter specifically asked for the "shimmer" version, as the dress is removable, as well as the shoes. I guess some of the other versions only have the skirt removable, or come without shoes.
customer_reviews.author: gailengineer

customer_reviews.title: Just as  described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described. Good quality and cheaper than in the stores. Does contain small pieces like the shoes that come off and won't really stay on once the packing is removed. My daughter loves them however.

customer_reviews.title: Just as  described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described. Good quality and cheaper than in the stores. Does contain small pieces like the shoes that come off and won't really stay on once the packing is removed. My daughter loves them however.
customer_reviews.author: Riddle me this

customer_reviews.title: DISNEY DOLLS
customer_reviews.text: This doll was purchased for our six year old grand daughter and she loved it. She made a list and this was one of the many Disney Dolls she now has.
customer_reviews.author: W.N.

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described. Good quality and cheaper than in the stores. Does contain small pieces like the shoes that come off and won't really stay on once the packing is removed. My daughter loves her!
customer_reviews.author: Riddle me this

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described. Good quality and cheaper than in the stores. Does contain small pieces like the shoes that come off and won't really stay on once the packing is removed. My daughter loves her!
customer_reviews.author: Riddle me this

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it got it for a birthday girl who loves mulan
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal and quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Nice quality for the price. Bought the book and DVD to match and it was a great gift for my 5 year old. She loves playing with it and the doll joins her every time she reads the book or watches the movie.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Lovely doll, and cannot beat the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was beyond thrilled to get this doll on Christmas, and I was thrilled about the price. Who needs to spend $18 on a princess doll when this is just perfect? Very happy mom and kid!
customer_reviews.author: Holly E. Mays

customer_reviews.title: Good doll for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my granddaughter, along with a couple of other Royal Simmer Princess dolls. She loved it. I thought they were cute, but made fairly cheaply, but they weren't expensive, so I guess there's no complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Funnybones

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: So glad they have a new Pocahontas doll.. I bought this for my mom and she loved it!! We don't see a whole lot of her and jasmine so I was super excited for them.. These dolls are so adorable
customer_reviews.author: Page S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value; she loves it!
customer_reviews.text: How do you go wrong with a $5 doll? It's actually very comparable to $30 dolls I've bought. I bought the whole collection for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Handler

customer_reviews.title: the doll is so vivid high quality . any little child will love it
customer_reviews.text: so cute in a great package the doll is so vivid high quality . any little child will love it . I got the series cause they were at great add in price and they will make a great gift
customer_reviews.author: FLOWERPOWERMD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Present for a Little Girl
customer_reviews.text: It was a cute Jasmine Doll. My friend's daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabreezy Aint Easy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Jasmine doll.
customer_reviews.text: Jasmine looks beautiful in the shimmer outfit, and her hair is just beautiful. My grand daughter loved adding her to her collection of princess dolls she has.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Vensko

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love a princess?
customer_reviews.text: What could possibly be wrong with a beautiful princess doll? This doll, along with all the other Royal Shimmer Dolls, is adorable, cute and well made. My daughter absolutely loves each and every one of them!
customer_reviews.author: jro

customer_reviews.title: There's nothing really wrong with it, but you can't ...
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing really wrong with it, but you can't take her hair down because of a big bald spot. That was a big deal to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 yr old granddaughter and had it shipped directly to her so I didn't see it before she received the doll. I do know that she loves it and her mom said it was a pretty doll.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie L. Waidler

customer_reviews.title: Quality doll, Great price
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great doll. My daughter absolutely loves it, not as tall as a normal Barbie but she is well made. The thumbs stick a little bit when trying to put on the dress but otherwise a nice toy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Merida Shimmer doll
customer_reviews.text: Very cute Merida doll. I prefer the Disney classic version. It looks more like the movie character's features. But this was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: musicfan

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this doll! it made my daughters day to open this on her birthday since she has been wanting a Mulan doll for a while now and has never seen one in stores! very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tonilyn Wittmer

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful gown. Be aware
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ordered this. Arrived New in the box, very promptly. Very beautiful gown. Be aware, the arms and legs only move at the hip and shoulder (unlike Barbie brand that bends at the knee and elbow also).
customer_reviews.author: Lali DeRosier

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice, good quality Mulan doll. Goes well with my daughters Disney doll collection.
customer_reviews.author: Kailey

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: very beauty doll. she is super pretty and her hair feels like real hair. its soft and long. the clothing is very nice and super pretty. nicest doll I have ever seen and my daughter loves her.
customer_reviews.author: Jenene

customer_reviews.title: Good Condition, Box Was Open
customer_reviews.text: The doll itself is in perfect condition, but I didn't expect her package to be open inside the Amazon box. Still a good value and acceptable for intended purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Annie09

customer_reviews.title: She is happy though so that is all that matters
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old likes the doll but I dont know, I think her face looks a little weird compared to the other Princess Jasmine dolls. She is happy though so that is all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Jennis0212

customer_reviews.title: Great doll for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Great doll for my granddaughter. She loves to play with her hair. Costume is as it appears and the clothes come off and on easily.
customer_reviews.author: loveupnorth

customer_reviews.title: Mulan
customer_reviews.text: Her face is a little off not really Asian but otherwise a great doll
customer_reviews.author: kela

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty Mulan Barbie for a great price, she even has delicate red shoes too. My daughter loves her.
customer_reviews.author: Island-Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice detail on the dress and doll seems stu I ...
customer_reviews.text: Doll is larger proportioned than expected, especially the head. Very nice detail on the dress and doll seems stu I like the ethnic doll series Disney is putting out at reasonable prices.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Campo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected, the doll was clean and without flaws. She's perfect for an upcoming project. I love the unique head scuplt.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: This is a great doll, for only 8 dollars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great doll, for only 8 dollars. And my daughter LOVES it!! Will be purchasing more for holidays, birthdays, ect.
customer_reviews.author: MDMomma

customer_reviews.title: We have a couple of these and my daughter loves ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a couple of these and my daughter loves them. They can wear clothes made for a Barbie but not the shoes. And the glitter on the dress doesn't shed almost at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Like the detail, very well made doll
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered more of these dolls.i am very pleased with the purchase. It is a great gift for a little girl
customer_reviews.author: M. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my little girl was so happy to add this to her doll collection

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations . Excellent quality . Very realistic. and better than Mattel products Bought two of these so far as gifts for my daughter and niece . Super fast delivery amazon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing doll for the price. Just as beautiful as a Disney Store doll

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product

customer_reviews.title: First Princess
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like pictured. My granddaughter is going to love her hair. This will be her first princess doll.
customer_reviews.author: KarenJ

customer_reviews.title: Great great price too
customer_reviews.text: This doll is so cute! I would definitely buy another. Great great price too.

customer_reviews.title: just as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! same doll you would buy at the store just half the price. my daughter loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Fionda

customer_reviews.title: Kind of odd but still cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doll with the accompanying Maximus horse, thinking that they could be used together. I was surprised that there were no knee joints in the doll so she can't sit on the horse. It's OK - cute and it delighted our 3-year-old granddaughter but it's not up to Barbie standards.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hillyer

customer_reviews.title: Buying them all
customer_reviews.text: Super cute love these dolls more than traditional barbie. They looks so much like the characters freckles and all!

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves play with Merida Doll
customer_reviews.text: great birthday gift for my granddaughter - she loves paying with it

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product I'm very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doll for my sister who is disabled . Her birthday is November 30 and she is handicapped and loves dolls . This is a great product I'm very pleased .

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I love these disney princess dolls! They are adorable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashantae P.

customer_reviews.title: Watch the pricing on Amazon- don't over pay
customer_reviews.text: Several of the dolls in this collection are also sold at Walmart- some in the collection are $5+ more on Amazon than on the shelf of your local Walmart. The doll was as advertised and fill a void in my little Disney fan's collection
customer_reviews.author: LegoCrazy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product

customer_reviews.text: christmas gift for granddaughter, Im sure she loved it and the prices was great! Thanks

customer_reviews.title: awesome buy!

customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I thought it would be! My daughter loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful doll for Mulan fans
customer_reviews.text: My daughter adores the Mulan cartoon. This doll is perfect and made her squeal with glee. For those who'd like to know - elbows and knees don't bend.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous doll - better than pictures

customer_reviews.title: Very cute Rapunzel!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this little doll! She is very cute and looks a lot like the Rapunzel in the movie. Only complaint is that her hair isn't long enough. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

product_meta.title: Disney Princess Royal Shimmer Cinderella Doll
product_meta.description: Style:Cinderella DollCinderella is ready for shimmering adventures with your little princess! Wearing her classic outfit with a new twist, Royal Shimmer Cinderella dazzles in a signature-colored, jewel-ombre gown with glitter print detailing. Your little dreamer will love playing out magical moments from Disney's Cinderella, as well as imagining her own fairy tale with this beloved Princess. Copyright Disney Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Doll features a shimmering gown in her signature color
Gown has beautiful ombre and glitter accents
Includes doll, outfit, pair of shoes, and 2 accessories.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars665 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
